DOC.brief_summary: Refine content delivery mHealth deliver lifestyle intervention program iterative test small group user provide feedback on-line asynchronous focus group .
DOC.brief_title: User Testing Feedback Mobile Health Program Postpartum Women : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask : - Use mobile app 4 week - Receive support lifestyle coach - Provide weekly ongoing feedback via online asynchronous user group platform usability , navigability , acceptability , satisfaction .
DOC.criteria: Age 1845 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 25 45 kg/m2 Positive history one following complication recent singleton pregnancy : 1 . Gestational diabetes mellitus 2 . Preeclampsia ( high blood pressure proteinuria diagnose 20 week gestation ) 3 . Gestational hypertension ( new hypertension diagnose 20 week without proteinuria ) 4 . Preterm delivery ( 3237 week ) 5 . Small gestational age ( < 10th percentile gestational age ) Able communicate English Access willing use wifi enable iPhone iPod Access computer internet access Capable providing inform consent Between 4 week 24 week delivery Personal history Type 1 2 diabetes Personal history breast cancer type cancer basal cell skin cancer ; Personal history major chronic illness include cardiovascular disease ( coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure , valvular heart disease , stroke , transient ischemic attack , intermittent claudication ) , kidney disease , liver disease , venous arterial thromboembolic disease , adrenal insufficiency , depression require hospitalization within past 6 month , nonpregnancy relate illness require overnight hospitalization past 6 month ; Underlying disease/treatment might interfere participation in/completion study ( e.g . significant gastrointestinal condition , major psychiatric disorder , others discretion study clinician )
